ARABIC: إِنَّ مَا تُوعَدُونَ لَءَاتٍ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: What you are promised will come about and you can do nothing to prevent it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The promise that was made to you is bound to be fulfilled. It is not in your power to defeat it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely what you have been promised shall come to pass; and you do not have the power to frustrate (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Whatever you are promised will inevitably come true and you can do nothing to prevent it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the thing which you are promised will definitely come to pass, and you cannot escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Surely, that which you are promised, will verily come to pass, and you cannot escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely what you are threatened with must come to pass and you cannot escape (it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The thing you are promised, that will surely come; you cannot frustrate it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! that which ye are promised will surely come to pass, and ye cannot escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: That which you are promised shall surely come to pass and you cannot prevent it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily that which ye are promised is sure to arrive, and ye cannot escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed what you are promised will surely come, and you will not be able to thwart it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: All that hath been promised unto you will come to pass: nor can ye frustrate it (in the least bit).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Surely, that which you are promised will verily come to pass, and you cannot escape (from the Punishment of Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: That which you are promised is sure to come. You shall not frustrate Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: What you are promised is coming, and you cannot thwart it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, what you are promised is coming, and you will not cause failure [to Allah].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [6:134] Truly, that which you are promised, of the Hour and chastisement, will surely come to pass, inevitably, and you cannot escape, [you cannot] elude Our chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! that which ye are promised) of torment (will surely come to pass, and ye cannot escape) such a torment, for it will reach wherever you are.
